item.title: Sending and consuming messages with Spring and KafKa
item.description: Spring Kafka Writer and Readers What is Kafka Apache Kafka is an open-source stream-processing software platform developed by the Apache Software Foundation written in Scala and Java. You’ll find more information about Kafka at it’s Homepage. Intro to Spring For Apache Kafka The Spring for Apache Kafka (spring-kafka) project applies core Spring concepts to the development of Kafka-based messaging solutions. It provides a “template” as a high-level abstraction for sending messages.
